|function! s:cleanup_history() abort
|    let history = 'cmd'
|    let xs = []
|    for i in range(1, histnr(history))
|        let x = histget(history, i)
|        if x =~# '^\(e\|echo\|tabnew\|new\|cd\|lcd\)'
|            let xs += [x]
|        endif
|    endfor
|    call histdel(history)
|    for x in xs
|        call histadd(history, x)
|    endfor
|endfunction
|
|augroup vimrc
|    autocmd!
|    autocmd CmdlineLeave *           :call s:cleanup_history()
|augroup END

CmdlineLeaveが加わったから、historyのお掃除が捗る
